message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a deep learning model for predicting cloud images, which involves computer vision (CV) techniques such as convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and long-short-term memory (LSTM) networks. Therefore, cs.CV is the most likely sub-category. The paper also introduces a new loss function, which involves machine learning (ML) techniques such as neural networks, and thus cs.LG and cs.AI are also likely sub-categories. The paper uses infrared satellite images, which falls under the sub-category of information retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the paper involves training the model using a large dataset, which involves optimization techniques such as stochastic gradient descent (SGD), and thus cs.NE is also a likely sub-category.
